sentences.en: Aiming at this situation, this paper presents a new type of key - logger.
sentences.cn: 针对该现状, 提出一种新型的键盘记录方法.

sentences.en: An injured logger is often far from professional emergency treatment.
sentences.cn: 受伤的伐木者经常远离专业的急救护理.

sentences.en: For example, polling, billing, and logger functions must be invoked before the actual program begins.
sentences.cn: 例如投票 、 支付和登录函数必须在实际种程序启动前运行.

sentences.en: NT Event Logger Component full source code can be used directly.
sentences.cn: NT事件记录器组件的全部源代码可以直接使用.

sentences.en: Present numeral logger is complex in structure, easy to trouble and price expensive.
sentences.cn: 现在的数字测井仪结构复杂, 易出故障,价格昂贵.

sentences.en: Serves also as anti clipboard logger.
sentences.cn: 同时担任反剪贴板记录.

sentences.en: The data logger device has been fitted to ship's engine room.
sentences.cn: 数字记录仪装置已安装在船只的机舱里.

sentences.en: The data logger is interfaced directly with the minicomputer.
sentences.cn: 数据记录器直接与小型计算机连接.

sentences.en: The density logger consists of a radiation source.
sentences.cn: 密度测井仪包括辐射源.

sentences.en: The environment Radon logger FD 216 is an instantaneous surveying instrument in situ.
sentences.cn: FD216型环境氡测量仪是在现场瞬时测量氡的仪器.

sentences.en: The man did work that was thought to be manlier. He was a logger.
sentences.cn: 老先生做的是一般认为较适合男性的工作-当一名樵夫.

sentences.en: The paper presents setting up gas logger operational curve model by applying mathematics regression analysis method.
sentences.cn: 该文提出应用数学回归分析方法建立气测仪工作曲线模式.

sentences.en: The Singleton pattern is used in the design of logger classes.
sentences.cn: 单件模式被用在日志记录类中.

words.tran_cn: 把…锯成段木；砍伐树木（log的ing形式）

phrases.tran_cn: 数据记录器；巡回检测装置；数据自动测定
